page.title: 14Weel village near Beverley
page.content: Weel is a tiny village tucked away on the other side of the River Hull. When we went on a survey there,we interviewed a few people. People who live there have to like the countryside and the quiet life. Some people we interviewed said they shop in Hull or Beverley. They would like more local entertainment but they would not like Weel to grow in the future. They would like more farming and public houses. The children of Weel are not able to catch buses to school,they have to use their own transport. People who live there seem to be elderly.We saw only two families with children. Weel is very small,there are about forty houses. It is very isolated and quiet.
